title: Else-if statements
message:
*else-if statements-using the keyword else if to check for specific condition
*just like if statements, it runs the code wrapped in cruly braces{}only if a condition is true
*But onlyif the initial if statementis false
*Again just like if the condition is any boolean value (true/false) or any boolean expression i.e.1=== 1 or 1 !==1
*the condition being checked mustbe insideparenthesis()
